Name: Windtracker
Desc: A mask adorned with goggles and feathers that you can find being sold at Chuwen Fair in the Stadium of the Sacred Flame. The goggles represent the courage to resist the storm, and the feathers represent the yearning for the sky. Countless heroes in their respective tales were propelled by such courage and yearning to embark on their journeys and keep moving forward.
Source: Learned from Realm Depot Furnishing Blueprint
